scripts.lint: npm --prefix ./api run lint && npm --prefix ./frontend run lint
scripts.lint-fix: npm --prefix ./api run lint-fix && npm --prefix ./frontend run lint-fix
scripts.postinstall: if [ $CLIENT_ENV ]; then npm run postinstall-client; elif [ $SERVER_ENV ]; then npm run postinstall-server; else echo no environment detected, please set CLIENT_ENV or SERVER_ENV; fi
scripts.postinstall-client: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.test-api: npm --prefix ./api run lint-ts && npm --prefix ./api run lint
scripts.test-front: npm --prefix ./frontend run lint-ts && npm --prefix ./frontend run lint
scripts.test: npm run test-api && npm run test-front
scripts.deploy: npm run test && npm run push-frontend-to-heroku && npm run push-backend-to-heroku
